abstract: Rembert Browne reviews anthologies Black Power 50, edited by Sylviane A Diouf and Komozi Woodard, and The Black Panthers: Portraits From an Unfinished Revolution, edited by Bryan Shih and Yohuru Williams.

headline.main: Say It Loud: Two New Books Look Back at Black Power

keywords.value: The Black Panthers: Portraits From an Unfinished Revolution (Book)
keywords.name: creative_works

snippet: The roots of Black Lives Matter in the Black Power movement and the Black Panthers....
lead_paragraph: The roots of Black Lives Matter in the Black Power movement and the Black Panthers.
